background.chooseImageOrVideo: Choose an image or video to use as wallpaper

onlineTips.a: Submit after pressing the Enter key or when the input field loses focus.
onlineTips.b: The wallpaper caching strategy depends on the browser, and wallpapers may not be accessible offline.
onlineTips.c: There will be a blank screen before the wallpaper finishes loading, and the duration depends on your internet speed.
onlineTips.d: Please ensure the wallpaper API you are using allows cross-origin requests; otherwise, it will fail to load.

background.pauseWhenBlur: Pause video background when the tab loses focus

request.message: To access online wallpapers, the extension needs to request the appropriate permissions:
request.title: Permission Request

background.sunMoonSaying: When the sun’s out, bathe in sunlight. But when the moon’s out, bathe in moonlight!
background.tip: If no background is set for dark mode, the light mode background or video will be used.
background.title: Background
background.videoBlurTip: Turn on to reduce performance usage when multiple new tabs or windows are open on the screen simultaneously.
background.videoWarning: Using a video as a background consumes a lot of GPU resources. It is recommended to avoid opening multiple new tabs at the same time. It is recommended to turn off animation, blur, and transparency effects appropriately to reduce performance consumption.

warning.cacheDisabled: Online wallpaper caching has been disabled because the “Access all websites” permission was not granted.
warning.fileIsNotImage: The selected file is not an image!
warning.monetDisabled: Dynamic Theme Colors (Monet Extraction) has been disabled because “Access all sites” permission was not granted.
warning.notGranted: Permission not granted, cannot access this host.
warning.title: Warning

tooLarge.message: The file is too large ({{size}}) and may affect performance or occupy significant storage. Do you want to continue?
tooLarge.title: Large File Warning

warning.unknownSource: Using images from unknown sources as backgrounds may expose your device to attacks. Do you want to continue?

background.youLikeFine: If you like it, that’s fine~

defaultSort.desc: Takes effect after refreshing the page
defaultSort.title: Default sorting

bookmark.rightClickToOpen: Right click on background to open
bookmark.title: Bookmarks bar

clock.blinkingTip: Turning this off can reduce sustained GPU usage.
clock.invertColorDark: [Clock] Use dark text in dark mode
clock.invertColorLight: [Clock] Use dark text in light mode
clock.secondsTip: This increases performance usage. Consider enabling “Smaller time” for a better look.
clock.title: Clock

confirmPurgeData.message: This operation will reset the extension settings, ignored most visited sites, pinned or favorited sites, selected background images or videos, etc.
confirmPurgeData.title: Are you sure you want to purge all data of this extension?

confirmPurgeWallpaper.message: This operation will delete the selected background images or videos.
confirmPurgeWallpaper.title: Are you sure you want to purge all wallpaper cache?

importExport.versionMismatch: The configuration version in the file does not match the current extension configuration version.

warningDialog.content: Importing will overwrite your current data. Please be cautious when using this feature!
warningDialog.title: Are you sure you want to import from the file?

other.syncWarning: Cloud Sync may overwrite local settings and cannot sync the following items: background images, most visited sites, dark mode state, etc. Items that do not support syncing will be marked with an indicator as shown on the right:
other.title: Other

perf.bgSwitchAnimTip: When disabled, there will be no fade-in/fade-out animation when switching backgrounds, which can slightly improve switching speed. Background animation on startup will also be disabled
perf.title: Performance

search.launchAnim: Search box expand animation on startup
search.tip: Want to activate the search input when opening a new tab? Check the “Help and Feedback” in the button menu at the bottom right of the page.
search.title: Search

shortcut.maxItemsTipForChrome: Tip: You can only have up to 10 most visited links.
shortcut.restoreDefaultTitle: Are you sure you want to restore default shortcuts?
shortcut.tip: Tip: You can drag the settings window to see changes in the shortcut area.
shortcut.title: Shortcut
shortcut.whiteTextInLightMode: [Shortcut] Use white text in light mode
shortcut.whiteTextTip: Disable the “Shortcut area background” and set “Mask opacity” to 0 for a better appearance.

colorful.desc: Apply the theme color to more elements
colorful.label: Global Color Mode

askEnableCache.message: To use dynamic theme colors, online wallpaper cache must be enabled. Enabling cache will store images from this domains. Do you want to enable it?
askEnableCache.title: Enable wallpaper cache?

monet.desc: Inspired by Material Design 3, extracts theme colors from your wallpaper. Only supports image backgrounds. For the best visual effect, use it together with the “Global Color Mode” option.
monet.label: Dynamic Theme Colors (Monet Extraction)

yiyan.description: Display a random Chinese quote below the search bar. Give it a try — you can always turn it off later!
yiyan.invertColorDark: [Quote] Use dark text in dark mode
yiyan.invertColorLight: [Quote] Use dark text in light mode
yiyan.normalyShowTip: When disabled, only show when the search box is focused.

hitokoto.name: Hitokoto.cn
hitokoto.note: Please note that Hitokoto.cn has a very strict QPS (queries per second) limit. This extension uses caching, but multiple requests from different sites in a short period may still cause your IP to be temporarily banned.

yiyan.title: Quote
